metadata.title: CVE-2019-15099 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
drivers/net/wireless/ath/ath10k/usb.c in the Linux kernel through 5.2.8 hasa NULL pointer dereference via an incomplete address in an endpointdescriptor.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15099` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic-lpae - 3.11.0-12.19

No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-13-generic - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
